summary: Add 3 new master cloak spell to your skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Hello everybody thank you for visit my mod sorry about my english.

[/size]***DESCRIPTION***

I made this mod because i see that cloak spell for mage is so lame for anyone who play as pure mage.
It only cause damage for a very very close enemies with pure mage is dangerous.
So i made this mod give you 3 new master spell include :
**Arcane Burning Cloak.
**Arcane Frozen Cloak.
**Arcane Lightning Cloak.
Those cloak will deal damage to any enemies that is a bit close to you for 60 second.
This spell as long as it last it will have magic-looking rune on your character skin (replace for whirlwind effect of vanilla cloak spell).

         ***INSTALLATION***

         Copy direct to your install direction

***VENDOR LOCATION***

Farengar Secret-fire in Dragon Search

***THANK YOU AND PLEASE DONT COMPLAIN IF YOU SEE ANY MOD THAT SAME AS THS MOD CAUSE I NOT STEAL FROM ANYONE***
author: congtuan999
